input.sentences: there were a lot of cool costumes at the party last night .
some of the couples came in matching costumes .
a lot of them were very unique .
afterward we all got together for pictures .
output.sentences: The ogre was hosting a dinner party at his house.
His friend Ceasar and Cleo brought some games with them to play
The Sumo Wrestler put on a fashion show for entertainment
The fashion show got out of hand quickly.
All of the guests were okay in the end.
